ygData.subject: Re: Barbarian Shaman: Stuck at lvl 22
ygData.msgSnippet: LONG haul to LOIO-- actually, Stonebrunt is closer to you. Best way--get a port to BB and take the shuttles to Kunark. Worst Way--get a port to Dreadlands, and
ygData.messageBody:
LONG haul to LOIO-- actually, Stonebrunt is
closer to you. Best way--get a port to BB and take the
shuttles to Kunark. Worst Way--get a port to Dreadlands,
and try to run across to FV. Not safe, I do it at lvl
35 and still get scared. (but what do i know, i'm a
wimpy tree-hugging druid). <br><br>SK is where you'll
want to be soon. XP AND loot are great at the spires.
LOIO is great xp, but the loot is not very good
(except a few of the SHM only items that drop off
sarnys). You can fill up on FS and SP gear (gloves are
best, sell for at least 20pp each on Xev).
<br><br>BTW-- I LOVED the 20s, they went by too fast and now
i'm stuck in 30s--:9<br><br>Oh-- I got to lvl 20
fighting Orcs in HHP-- hence the surname Orcbane.
<br><br>Xela Orcbane<br>Druid of the 35th Circle<br>Defenders
of Mithril Hall<br>Xev<br><br>"I am now of the 35th
season, and have attained the rank of Tunare's shoe
sniffer-- WOOT!!!"
